mapper.update: UPDATE sys_role SET systemId=#{systemId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , alias=#{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , roleName=#{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , memo=#{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , allowDel=#{allowDel,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , allowEdit=#{allowEdit,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , enabled=#{enabled,jdbcType=NUMERIC} WHERE roleId=#{roleId}
mapper.select: select * from SYS_ROLE role where role.roleId=#{roleId}
SELECT * FROM SYS_ROLE o where o.roleId in (SELECT distinct roleId FROM bpm_mon_orgrole WHERE groupId=#{groupId})
select * from SYS_ROLE role where role.roleName=#{roleName}
SELECT count(*) amount FROM SYS_ROLE where alias=#{alias}
select * from SYS_ROLE r where r.alias=#{alias}
SELECT count(*) amount FROM SYS_ROLE where alias=#{alias} and roleId <> #{roleId}
SELECT r.* FROM SYS_ROLE r join SYS_USER_ROLE ur on r.roleId = ur.roleId where ur.userId=#{userId} and r.enabled=1
SELECT r.* FROM SYS_ROLE r where r.roleid in (select t.roleid from sys_org_role t where t.orgid=#{orgId})
SELECT * FROM SYS_ROLE where systemId=#{systemId}

select a.roleId,a.systemId,a.alias,a.roleName,a.memo,a.allowDel,a.allowEdit,a.enabled, b.sysName as subSysName from SYS_ROLE a ,SYS_SUBSYSTEM b where a.systemId=b.systemId AND b.systemId = #{systemId} and a.enabled=1 AND a.roleName LIKE #{roleName}

select * from ( SELECT sr.roleId,decode( sr.systemId,null,-1,sr.systemId) systemId ,sr.alias,sr.roleName,decode(ss.sysName,null,'-',ss.sysName) subSysName, decode(sr.memo,null,'-', sr.memo) memo FROM SYS_ROLE sr left join SYS_SUBSYSTEM ss on sr.systemId=ss.systemId union select sy.systemId roleId,0 systemId,sy.alias,sy.sysName roleName,sy.sysName subSysName,sy.memo FROM SYS_SUBSYSTEM sy join SYS_ROLE ro on sy.systemId=ro.systemId ) tt where 1=1
and systemId=#{systemId}

select * from ( SELECT sr.roleId,decode( sr.systemId,null,-1,sr.systemId) systemId ,sr.alias,sr.roleName,decode(ss.sysName,null,'-',ss.sysName) subSysName, decode(sr.memo,null,'-', sr.memo) memo FROM SYS_ROLE sr left join SYS_SUBSYSTEM ss on sr.systemId=ss.systemId union select sy.systemId roleId,0 systemId,sy.alias,sy.sysName roleName,sy.sysName subSysName,sy.memo FROM SYS_SUBSYSTEM sy join SYS_ROLE ro on sy.systemId=ro.systemId ) tt where 1=1
and systemId=#{systemId}

select * from ( SELECT sr.roleId,CASE sr.systemId WHEN null THEN -1 ELSE sr.systemId END systemId ,sr.alias,sr.roleName,CASE ss.sysName WHEN null THEN '-' ELSE ss.sysName END subSysName, CASE sr.memo WHEN NULL THEN '-' ELSE sr.memo END memo FROM SYS_ROLE sr left join SYS_SUBSYSTEM ss on sr.systemId=ss.systemId union select sy.systemId roleId,0 systemId,sy.alias,sy.sysName roleName,sy.sysName subSysName,sy.memo FROM SYS_SUBSYSTEM sy join SYS_ROLE ro on sy.systemId=ro.systemId ) tt where 1=1
and systemId=#{systemId}

select * from ( SELECT sr.roleId,CASE WHEN sr.systemId IS NULL THEN -1 ELSE sr.systemId END systemId ,sr.alias,sr.roleName,CASE WHEN ss.sysName IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE ss.sysName END subSysName, CASE WHEN sr.memo IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE sr.memo END memo FROM SYS_ROLE sr left join SYS_SUBSYSTEM ss on sr.systemId=ss.systemId union select sy.systemId roleId,0 systemId,sy.alias,sy.sysName roleName,sy.sysName subSysName,sy.memo FROM SYS_SUBSYSTEM sy join SYS_ROLE ro on sy.systemId=ro.systemId ) tt where 1=1
and systemId=#{systemId}

select * from ( SELECT sr.roleId, (CASE WHEN sr.systemId IS NULL THEN -1 ELSE sr.systemId END) systemId ,sr.alias,sr.roleName,(CASE WHEN ss.sysName IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE ss.sysName END) subSysName, (CASE WHEN sr.memo IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE sr.memo END) memo FROM SYS_ROLE sr left join SYS_SUBSYSTEM ss on sr.systemId=ss.systemId union select sy.systemId roleId,0 systemId,sy.alias,sy.sysName roleName,sy.sysName subSysName,sy.memo FROM SYS_SUBSYSTEM sy join SYS_ROLE ro on sy.systemId=ro.systemId ) tt where 1=1
and systemId=#{systemId}

select * from ( SELECT sr.roleId,CASE sr.systemId WHEN null THEN -1 ELSE sr.systemId END systemId ,sr.alias,sr.roleName,CASE ss.sysName WHEN null THEN '-' ELSE ss.sysName END subSysName, CASE sr.memo WHEN NULL THEN '-' ELSE sr.memo END memo FROM SYS_ROLE sr left join SYS_SUBSYSTEM ss on sr.systemId=ss.systemId union select sy.systemId roleId,0 systemId,sy.alias,sy.sysName roleName,sy.sysName subSysName,sy.memo FROM SYS_SUBSYSTEM sy join SYS_ROLE ro on sy.systemId=ro.systemId ) tt where 1=1
and systemId=#{systemId}
SELECT r.* FROM SYS_ROLE r join sys_org_rolemanage ur on r.roleId = ur.roleId where ur.orgId=#{orgId}
SELECT a.*,c.sysName as subSysName FROM SYS_ROLE a left join SYS_AUTH_ROLE b on a.roleId = b.role_Id left join SYS_SUBSYSTEM c on a.systemId=c.systemId where b.auth_id=#{authId} and a.enabled=1

SELECT distinct a.*,c.sysName as subSysName FROM SYS_ROLE a left join SYS_AUTH_ROLE b on a.roleId = b.role_Id left join SYS_SUBSYSTEM c on a.systemId=c.systemId left join SYS_ORG_AUTH d on b.auth_id = d.id where d.user_id=#{userId} and a.enabled=1 AND a.systemId = #{systemId} AND a.roleName LIKE #{roleName}
